Bootstrap Themes

Taking after the great Bootswatch idea, I made a few of my own Bootstrap CSS themes.

Each can be seen below.

Default

The default bootstrap.

Earthen

Of the Earth.

Equestria

The colors of My Little Pony.

Fantasy

Go on a quest.

Galactic

Fight laser wars in space.

Imperial

All the glory to the Emperor.

Minecraft

The colors of minecraft.

New World Order

Everyone is a consumer now.

Tribal

Ancient tribal feel.
